Captions:
Creating a safer environment together, for your digital transactions with #Singpass! 

Singpass is your trusted and secure digital identity for everyday digital transactions. More importantly, it is the key to your personal and sensitive information. 

In the past year, Singpass has introduced a series of measures to enhance protections for your account. 

Learn more about these below, and how you can play a part in safeguarding your Singpass account! Stay tuned for Part 2. 

Visit go.gov.sg/even-safer-singpass for more information. 

#EvenBetterSingpass #CyberSG #DigitalIdentity #TechForPublicGood #GovTechSG

Fast 💵? We only see a huge 🚩! 
Remember:
✔️Singpass will never send a web link or QR code via SMS or WhatsApp
✔️Always check that the URL domain of the Singpass website is singpass.gov.sg
✔️Look out for transactional alerts from Singpass, and keep your contact details up to date

Think twice and read between the lines! 👀 Not being careful with your Singpass account can lead to you falling prey to phishing. Losing your Singpass details can lead to monetary losses, not gains!

Be alert when transacting online and learn how to keep your Singpass safe via the link in our bio.

#Singpass #Phishing #Scams #OnlineScams #GovTechSG

🦉 You’ve met Ollie; now learn about the portal that Ollie is working for - #CrowdTaskSG!

#BeHeardEffectChange #CrowdTaskSG #TechForPublicGood #GovTechSG

Taking a moment to appreciate the works of Web Designers this Web Designer Day! ✨⁣
⁣
A well-made website or digital service with a consistent user experience helps user to navigate with ease and have a pleasant experience.⁣
⁣
This is why we developed the Singapore Government Design System (SGDS)! It consists of a collection of open-source, front-end components to build and customise websites. There is also a collection of frameworks, best practices and guidelines for developers, designers and writers. The SGDS was designed to help agencies to implement digital services faster and meet the goals of being accessible and easy to use!⁣
⁣
👉 Click on the link in bio to find out more about SGDS⁣
⁣
#Tech #TechMemes #UI #UX #WebsiteDesign #DevPortal #TechForPublicGood #GovTechSG

Even though Mental Health Awareness Month is coming to an end, here’s your reminder that self-care is an ongoing journey ✨

We’re thankful for relaxation spaces like our Energy Pod and our Employee Wellness Programme that enable us to take a mental break at work. 

Take a moment on this busy Monday to check in with yourself! 💕

What are some ways you take care of your mental health? Share with us in the comments! 

P.S. Hope the auntie won’t scold me for overwatering the plants, oops! 

#MentalHealthAwareness #MentalHealthMatters #InsideGovTech #GovTechSG

Let us bring you through GovTech’s A11y Week that happened last week! 🙌

A11y Week, organised by our Accessibility Enabling Team (A11y Team) in our Government Digital Services Division, is an annual learning festival for all public officers to explore what it means to design accessible and inclusive digital services for everyone in Singapore.

Public officers from over 80 agencies attended a series of educational physical workshops and virtual talks that put the spotlight on different forms of non-standard communication. In the workshops, participants got to experience the impact of inaccessible digital services first-hand, learned how to scan their agency websites for accessibility issues, and explored how we can all take actionable steps to support Persons with Disabilities through our work and in our daily lives. 
 
Join us as we journey to build more #TechForPublicGood 🤗

#Accessibility #Inclusivity #A11yWeekSG2023 #SmartNation #UX #Engineering #GovTechSG

Here are 3 key things you need to know about Java!⁣
👉It is a platform-independent and object-oriented programming language⁣
👉It is known for its ability to perform a wide range of tasks⁣
👉 It can be used for tasks and projects requiring both high performance and quick turnaround⁣
⁣
Here are some popular uses of Java:⁣
✔️building and running mobile applications⁣
✔️building and scaling cloud applications⁣
✔️developing chatbots and other marketing tools⁣
✔️powering enterprise-level web applications⁣
✔️supporting artificial intelligence (AI) and internet of things (IoT) devices⁣
⁣
💓 this post if you have learnt something new today!⁣
⁣
#KnowYourTech #Java #GovTechSG

Providing equal access to technology is something the Singapore Government is committed to. 💪⁣
 ⁣
At GovTech, our Accessibility Enabling Team (A11y Team) organises an annual A11y Week to raise awareness of inclusivity and accessibility in digital products. Public officers from across the Service attended talks and workshops over the 3-day learning festival.⁣
 ⁣
Our speakers this year - spanning people, public, and private sectors - delved into approaching inclusive communication at the organisational, community, and personal levels. They also dived deeper into what we can do to further our inclusion efforts as a digital government 🤗⁣
 ⁣
Swipe for key takeaways from the sharing from Sarah from Serving People with Disabilities @spdsingapore, Winston from @temasekpoly, Rory from @microsoft and Shanta from @netflix!⁣
 ⁣
#Accessibility #Inclusivity #A11yWeekSG2023 #UX #Engineering #SmartNation #DigitalSociety #DigitalGovernment #TechForPublicGood #GovTechSG
